alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 16 at 1:36AM MST until October 16 at 2:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 215 AM MST. * At 136 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bapchule, or near Sun Lakes, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Gilbert, Sun Lakes, Bapchule, Tumbleweed Park, Olberg, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, Chandler City Hall, Gilbert City Hall, Firebird Lake, Santan and Sacaton. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 161 and 179. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 151 and 170. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 43 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
